> Hi, guys,
> Is there any way I can let a failed  test or assert
> function like assertTrue(false) to invoke my own
> log method?  thanks a head.

Another thought:
If you're only interested in logging FAILED assertions, then all you 
need to do is override the 'runTest' method:

   protected void runTest() throws Throwable

Call 'super.runTest()' in a try/catch block, catch the exceptions; 
log and rethrow them.  If you want to do this to *all* your tests, 
then create an abstract base class that extends TestCase, containing 
your version of this method, and extend all your test classes from 
it, instead of TestCase.
